For all the people who are waiting for the second part, the author already said he gave up on this work.

"I gave up making a sequel on that story because I couldn't come up with a good story. Since the husband already noticed it, he will have to take action or he is a fool. I thought I could make him do it but there wasn't any room left for his wife in the story. I realized afterward that it is to hard to continue if the husband is already aware. (I think it is possible to have a view where the story is properly divided and there is no way to rebel against them but in our society it doesn't make sense for the husband to ignore it when he discovers it early).

Source: Afterwords of Ichiya Kagiri no Ayamamuchi.
